intro: Gibraltar is located on the rock of Gibraltar which is situated on the peninsular at the southern tip of Spain. It is 6 kilometres long. Gibraltar is one of the oldest offshore countries. The legal system is based on British common law and statute law.
highlights: Subject to name approval, a company can be formed in five days.
The names of the company officers appear on public record. Anonymity can be preserved through the use of nominee directors / shareholders.
The tax rate is 10% levied on company profits which derive in Gibraltar.
Very stable jurisdiction / no exchange controls.
Companies must appoint a resident company secretary.
